title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Niger - Revenue Policy and Administration

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

person-name.narrative: Andrew Velthaus, Jennifer Lee, and Kelley Vito

title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Revenue Administration and Revenue Policy - Niger

description.narrative: The project with the Direction Gnrale des Impts is focused on improving the arrears process; improving audit skills and management; assisting in change management and other support for the implementation of the SISIC information technology upgrade; developing standardized procedures and training anti-corruption investigators; creating a strategic plan and pilot management training.

person-name.narrative: Andrew Velthaus, Jennifer Lee, and Kelley Vito

title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Revenue Administration and Revenue Policy -Niger

description.narrative: Ensure the organizational reform project has a well-documented set of objectives, goals, milestones, etc., so the reform may be done effectively and efficiently; Develop and implement a project management structure, with staff, plans, controls, and performance measures to successfully complete the current tender for a major IT systems upgrade. Improvement in the tax administration's capacity to monitor and redress noncompliance.
